about_the_game:
LUA is a vibrant rhythm-action game about skating to the beat of the music, where you will embark on an adventure and heal family conflicts through a musical journey.



  • Rhythm Skating: Skate to the beat in a one-of-a-kind game that blends the freedom of longboarding with the flow of music!
  • Feel-Good OST: Get your spirits lifted with folk-rock tracks created by Gelpi.
  • Emotional Journey: Dive into a heartwarming story about healing and family reconciliation.
  • Connection with Nature: Explore a world where nature and humanity magically intertwine through gameplay, story, and fantastic characters.



This game is currently in development. If it’s your kind of game, feel free to add it to your wishlist to show your support and join us on Discord! 💜

name: LUA

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: AMD FX-6100/Intel i3-3220 or Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R7 360 2GB/NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 Ti 2GB or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
